import React,{useState}from'react';import campData from'./data.json';import Campaign from'./components/CampaignTable';// Import Campaign component
import PricingModal from'./components/PricingModal';// Import PricingModal component
import ScheduleModal from'./components/ScheduleModal';// Import ScheduleModal component
import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[language,setLanguage]=useState('en');// Track current language
const[activeTab,setActiveTab]=useState('upcoming');// Track active tab
const[showPricingModal,setShowPricingModal]=useState(false);// Modal state for Pricing
const[showScheduleModal,setShowScheduleModal]=useState(false);// Modal state for Scheduling
const[selectedCampaign,setSelectedCampaign]=useState(null);// Track selected campaign
const handleLanguageSwitch=()=>{setLanguage(language==='en'?'fr':'en');};// Handle opening modals
const handleOpenPricingModal=campaign=>{setSelectedCampaign(campaign);setShowPricingModal(true);};const handleOpenScheduleModal=campaign=>{setSelectedCampaign(campaign);setShowScheduleModal(true);};// Handle closing modals
const handleCloseModal=()=>{setShowPricingModal(false);setShowScheduleModal(false);setSelectedCampaign(null);};const getCampaigns=tab=>{return campData[tab].map(campaign=>({...campaign,name:campaign.name[language],region:campaign.region[language],price:campaign.price[language]}));};const campaigns=getCampaigns(activeTab);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Manage Campaign"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"language-switch",onClick:handleLanguageSwitch,children:language==='en'?'Switch to French':'Passer au français'})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setActiveTab('upcoming'),className:activeTab==='upcoming'?'active':'',children:"Upcoming Campaigns"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setActiveTab('live'),className:activeTab==='live'?'active':'',children:"Live Campaigns"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setActiveTab('past'),className:activeTab==='past'?'active':'',children:"Past Campaigns"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Date"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Campaign"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"View"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Actions"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:campaigns.map(campaign=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Campaign,{campaign:campaign,onViewPricing:handleOpenPricingModal,onSchedule:handleOpenScheduleModal},campaign.id))})]}),showPricingModal&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PricingModal,{campaign:selectedCampaign,onClose:handleCloseModal}),showScheduleModal&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ScheduleModal,{campaign:selectedCampaign,onClose:handleCloseModal})]});};export default App;
